name: Fiends Forgiven
description:
Arrows to navigate

WASD - Directional Melee

Q - Potion Throw

E - Slice-Through (works on Bats and Souls)

R - Restart

You can double-jump and wall-slide

Kill enemies and take their souls before the timer hits zero

Using the Metroidvania Asset by o_lobster: https://o-lobster.itch.io/

and sound effects by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Would love to hear feedback so please comment if you have any suggestions!
